inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: being treated with at least one, but no more than two antiepileptic drugs

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: at least 6 partial onset seizures during the 8-week baseline phase

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: features consistent with partial epilepsy performed prior to study initiation or during the baseline phase

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of pregnancy or nursing

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no mention of progressive disorder of the nervous system

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no clinical diagnosis of Lennox-Gastaut syndrome

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no history of generalized status epilepticus

notes: Patient has a history of epilepsy, CHF, and depression. He has had seizures in the past but was recently tapered off Dilantin and has been seizure-free for 20 years.
